text: 5.22: Ze 1.19; 1 Zo 3.15Gu ntigem khaŋ muuŋgia tɨga nde nzuai, Guma, ana won fek the, ana vhega mbatɨgir ana muuŋgi, mba guma, ana vhɨra bigi ndi thɨgar mbai guman pana nɨma thɨgɨrga. Guma the vhɨra buni mbatɨgir won fek the suaŋgirga, mba guma, ana vhɨra buaadegi gumgir guman pana vhari nɨma thɨgɨrga. Guma the vhɨra khaŋ harigi guma the suanga, ‘Ndu ŋanŋangi guma ma.’ Maaŋ ana suaŋgi guma, ana Herar vhavar ŋgirgɨrga.
